title: 9.6 Master Challenge 3
question: Lucy always keeps herself updated on social media platforms. She likes to share her content, pictures, and videos on her Facebook and Instagram accounts. She also does live videos on Facebook and Instagram. As a well-wisher, what would you advise Lucy so that she uses social media platforms wisely? How would you make her aware of multiple threats associated with social media?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
